page.title: 18RECREATION IN AYLESBURY
page.content: Aylesbury offers a wide range of {recreational facilities}. There are 2 parks in the town- The Vale and Bedgrove. There are also 2 swimming pools- The Maxwell and The Vale which is an {outdoor pool} and only open in the summer. The Civic Centre is the main source of {indoor recreation}. It has a thousand capacity hall and theatre as well as cafeteria, bar and conference facilities. There is also a small theatre in the Queens Park Centre which is open to the public every day for hobby work such as lace making and photography. There is a cinema- the Odeon, which offers a choice of 3 films weekly and is well patronised. There are many {sports facilities} in the town. We have The Ludwig Guttman Stadium and Aylesbury United F.C. as well as many private sports clubs.
